61.movie_plot: The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

145.movie_plot: After her last encounter, Ellen Ripley crash-lands on Fiorina 161, a maximum security prison. When a series of strange and deadly events occur shortly after her arrival, Ripley realizes that she brought along an unwelcome visitor.

177.movie_plot: A reclusive beekeeper slowly pulls his dysfunctional family back together, but not without having to fight his son's previous dastardly cohorts.

66.movie_plot: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

72.movie_plot: Investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

56.movie_plot: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

132.movie_plot: A young lawyer, Richard Goodwin, investigates a potentially fixed game show. Charles Van Doren, a big time show winner, is under Goodwin's investigation.

6.movie_plot: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves in a 1950s sitcom where their influence begins to profoundly change that complacent world.

138.movie_plot: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

43.movie_plot: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

201.movie_plot: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

45.movie_plot: A lawyer becomes a target by a corrupt politician and his NSA goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a serious politically motivated crime.

78.movie_plot: The classic Shakespearean play about a murderously scheming king staged in an alternative fascist England setting.

208.movie_plot: An idyllic sci-fi future has one major drawback: life must end at the age of 30.

106.movie_plot: Young lovers Hero and Claudio, soon to wed, conspire to get verbal sparring partners and confirmed singles Benedick and Beatrice to wed as well.

96.movie_plot: A hapless New York advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and is pursued across the country while he looks for a way to survive.

35.movie_plot: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there while another team approaches with another agenda.

10.movie_plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

136.movie_plot: The story of Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence.

170.movie_plot: When a corrupt businessman and the grotesque Penguin plot to take control of Gotham City, only Batman can stop them, while the Catwoman has her own agenda.

110.movie_plot: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

77.movie_plot: An impoverished woman who has been forced to choose between a privileged life with her wealthy aunt and her journalist lover, befriends an American heiress. When she discovers the heiress is attracted to her own lover and is dying, she sees a chance to have both the privileged life she cannot give up and the lover she cannot live without.

194.movie_plot: In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

75.movie_plot: A rich high school student tries to boost a new pupil's popularity, but reckons without affairs of the heart getting in the way.

76.movie_plot: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.

39.movie_plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

176.movie_plot: A spoof of Robin Hood in general and Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves (1991) in particular.

209.movie_plot: A barbarian warrior sets off to avenge his parents and his tribe whom were slain by an evil sorcerer and his henchmen when he was a boy.

107.movie_plot: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a Presidential sex scandal.

69.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
69.movie_plot: When Dr. Henry Jones, Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. must follow in his father's footsteps to stop the Nazis from getting their hands on the Holy Grail first.

147.movie_plot: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

4.movie_plot: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

58.movie_plot: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

29.movie_plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

162.movie_plot: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high flying masked hero.

112.movie_plot: Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity. His eagerness to please others and penchant for testing his boundaries sometimes gets him into trouble.

139.movie_plot: Wallace is used by a criminal penguin in a robbery involving mechanical trousers.

202.movie_plot: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.

211.movie_plot: Planet Spaceballs' President Skroob sends Lord Dark Helmet to steal planet Druidia's abundant supply of air to replenish their own, and only Lone Starr can stop them.

87.movie_plot: When he discovers his adopted son is a genius, a New York sportswriter seeks out the boy's birth mother: a ditzy porn star and prostitute.

196.movie_plot: In 1965, an unorthodox and irreverent DJ named Adrian Cronauer begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the U.S. Armed Services radio station in Vietnam.

1.movie_plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.

164.movie_plot: An incompetent, immature, and dimwitted heir to an auto parts factory must save the business to keep it out of the hands of his new, con-artist relatives and big business.

210.movie_plot: A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does.

193.movie_plot: An idiotic man struggles to make it through life on his own in St. Louis.

64.movie_plot: A rejected hockey player puts his skills to the golf course to save his grandmother's house.

120.movie_plot: In 1839, the revolt of Mende captives aboard a Spanish owned ship causes a major controversy in the United States when the ship is captured off the coast of Long Island. The courts must decide whether the Mende are slaves or legally free.

167.movie_name: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan (1982)
167.movie_plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

104.movie_plot: A 16-year-old girl visits her gay half-brother and ends up seducing his boyfriend, thus wreaking havoc on all of their lives.

24.movie_plot: Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop Al Capone; because of rampant corruption, he assembles a small, hand-picked team.

148.movie_plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

113.movie_plot: When a woman's long-time friend reveals he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.

131.movie_plot: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

52.movie_plot: A young Shakespeare, out of ideas and short of cash, meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

98.movie_plot: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, four soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

189.movie_plot: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

25.movie_plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

156.movie_plot: An overstressed suburbanite and his fellow neighbors are convinced that the new family on the block are part of a murderous Satanic cult.

184.movie_plot: A man is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must battle an army of the dead and retrieve the Necronomicon so he can return home.

19.movie_plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

93.movie_plot: When Queen Victoria's husband dies, she finds solace in her trusted servant, Mr. Brown, but their relationship also brings scandal and turmoil.

51.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

3.movie_plot: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.

127.movie_plot: A perfect red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.

95.movie_plot: James Bond heads to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.

21.movie_plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

180.movie_plot: James Bond willingly falls into an assassination ploy involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by SPECTRE.

134.movie_plot: A prepubescent chess prodigy refuses to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.

108.movie_plot: Female-born Teena Brandon adopts his male identity of Brandon Teena and attempts to find himself and love in Nebraska.

124.movie_plot: Suffering from writer's block and eagerly awaiting his writing award, Harry Block remembers events from his past and scenes from his best-selling books as characters, real and fictional, come back to haunt him.

146.movie_plot: Con artists plan to fleece an eccentric family using an accomplice who claims to be their long-lost uncle.

54.movie_plot: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

101.movie_plot: An aspiring director and the marginally talented amateur cast of a hokey small-town Missouri musical production go overboard when they learn that someone from Broadway will be in attendance.

159.movie_name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1963)
159.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

32.movie_plot: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the USA. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

205.movie_plot: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

182.movie_plot: The life and career of a legendary comedian, Andy Kaufman.

89.movie_plot: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

71.movie_plot: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain with an unscrupulous sea-witch in order to meet a human prince on land.

116.movie_plot: A film of the early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch.

188.movie_plot: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

166.movie_plot: When a recently-deceased ghost couple find their now-vacant home invaded by an obnoxious family, they hire a sleazy ghost who gets rid of humans to help them.
